name: SplatterHouse 3D: Gold Edition
summary:
This is the re-release of my old Splatterhouse 3D games. The graphics have been fixed, and many elements have been tweaked to refine gameplay and overall presentation. Return to Splatterhouse 3D has been considerably updated in addition, with new monsters and maps added. 
 
So whatcha waiting for? Grab this bloody package and start splatterin' heads! 
 
Also, please don't ignore the rest of my stuff. 
 
THERE ARE TWO GAMES IN THIS PACKAGE. 
 
Q TO QUIT, ESC TO RESTART.
